# Citations and Regular Links Mixed

Regular link [text](https://example.com) and citation [1].

Adjacent [link](https://example.com)[2] citation.

Citation [3] followed by [another link](https://example.com).

Nested? [[4]](https://example.com) citation as link text.

Citation in link text [[5] reference](https://example.com).

Multiple: [link1](https://one.com) [1] [link2](https://two.com) [2].

Image and citation: ![alt](image.png) [6].

Reference-style link [ref-link] and citation [7].

[ref-link]: https://reference.example.com
<!-- mdcitefix:refs -->
[1]: https://cite-one.example.com
[2]: https://cite-two.example.com
[3]: https://cite-three.example.com
[4]: https://cite-four.example.com
[5]: https://cite-five.example.com
[6]: https://cite-six.example.com
[7]: https://cite-seven.example.com
